item.description:
It looks like Saturday will be a good golfing day so I've booked a T time for 4 for tomorrow . This is a fairly new course and when I played it a few years ago it was in excellent shape.

The rates are $42 for walking, $57 with cart.

Because of the short notice I only reserved one T time. In the event it fills up and you want to play, please let me know and I will see what thye have available.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the pro shop

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: The Meadows at Peabody
